main.runtime

Class RuntimeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.runtime.RuntimeManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClubObserver

    public class RuntimeManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClubObserver
    RuntimeManager is the managing class and uses the singleton pattern, meaning, that the class can only be instantiated once.
    Author:
    Stefan Eike (s.eike85@gmail.com)

      • setClub

        public final void setClub(Club runtimeManagerClub)
        Set the club to be used in the RuntimeManager. Currently, the RuntimeManager can handle only one club.
        Parameters:
        runtimeManagerClub - club

      • getClub

        Return the club of the runtime manager.

      • getPasswordManager

        public final PasswordManager getPasswordManager()
        Return the password manager.
        Returns:
        PasswordManager

      • getRuntimeManagerInstance

        public static RuntimeManager getRuntimeManagerInstance()
        Instantiates RuntimeManager and returns the instance, if the constructor is called twice or more. This method corresponds to the singleton pattern.
        Returns:
        Returns an instance of RuntimeManager.

      • getLoggedInUser

        public final ClubMember getLoggedInUser()
        Returns the instance of VereinsMitglied of the logged in user.
        Returns:
        Returns logged in user

      • addPasswordManager

        public final void addPasswordManager(PasswordManager runtimePasswordManager)
        Add a PasswordManager to the RuntimeManager.
        Parameters:
        runtimePasswordManager - A PasswordManager

      • matchPassword

        public final boolean matchPassword(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Check, if the user's password matches to the stored passwort hash.
        Parameters:
        username - The user name of the user
        password - The password of the user
        Returns:
        Return TRUE, if the password is correct, otherwise return FALSE.

      • update

        public final void update()
        The observer method is calld when new messages are consumed from the subject.
        Specified by:
        update in interface ClubObserver

      • loginUser

        public final boolean loginUser(java.lang.String userName,
                java.lang.String password)
        Check if user name and password is correct and login the user afterwards.
        Parameters:
        userName - user name of the user
        password - password of the user
        Returns:
        return true, if the user has been successfully logged in.
